txt.en: 'My death means nothing!'
The forces of Mordor prepare for a final attack on the fields of the Pelennor.
'I have inflicted what hurts I could, and that fills me with gladness as I die!'
'Mordor and Sauron!'
'The dawning of a new age is upon us! Begone, for there is no place in it for such as you!'
'Begone!'
'Halbarad... my loyal friend...'

'I could not move, [placeholder]... it was fell sorcery, and... I was powerless...'

Horn's breath comes raggedly, and there are tears in his eyes.

'Halros sprang to my defence, and took the blows that were meant for me. He died in my place... there was nothing I could do...'
'Let us make for the city, [placeholder]. I have lost too many friends today.'
'Did you think the tide had turned?'
'The might of Mordor was not thwarted. It was... merely redirected.'
'Kill them all.'
Fight alongside Horn
'You are a fool, no matter what name you wear.'
'I am glad I was able... to see...'
Fight alongside Horn
'Did you think the tide had turned?'
'The might of Mordor was not thwarted. It was... merely redirected.'
'Kill them all.'
Talk to Horn and fight alongside him
'I will fight until my chief tells me to stop.'
Talk to Horn on the battlefield
'You will fight for him, I warrant, until this land is made safe?'
Talk to Horn on the battlefield
'The time for such questions is over, my new friend! Our enemies try another assault!'
Talk to Horn on the battlefield
You have found Aragorn and the Grey Company on the battlefield as they prepare to confront Gothmog.
You have found Aragorn and the Grey Company on the battlefield as they prepare to confront Gothmog.
Gothmog has fled the battlefield, leaving Aragorn and the Grey Company to mourn the slain he leaves behind.
You have found Horn in the midst of battle, but the bloodshed is taking its toll on him.
Talk to Horn during the brief reprieve
'[placeholder], I have not seen you since the morning, and I feared the worst! We have a brief reprieve for now, but it will not last long. I have seen such horrors... so many good men lost...'
Talk to Horn during the brief reprieve

'This young Ranger, this Halros, is able to do his duty without questioning it? Did I ever have that strength? I know that is what is expected of me, and I came here to prove it, but...\n\n'If I was more like him, would I be able to fight on this field without regret? It weighs me down, even as I know why I must fight. But so many have died, and still the hosts of Mordor pour onto the plain! I thought I could protect Nona and our child from harm, but I see now that there is no hope of that. There are too many evils arrayed against us!'
DNT - Blah!

'The enemies that pour forth from Mordor will not stop until they have slain every last one of us, [placeholder]. They will not stop even then, for there is no mercy in their hearts. They will kill even women and children, the old and the infirm.\n\n'I do not regret my decision! I will fight to make Nona and our child safe, and if I never see them again I will go to my grave knowing that I did what I could. I do not fight for glory or for honour. I fight for time, not for myself but for those I love!'
You have fought alongside Horn, but the horrors of battle are taxing his courage.
Defeat Crúmgam and his allies
'[placeholder], I have not seen you since the morning, and I feared the worst! We have a brief reprieve for now, but it will not last long. I have seen such horrors... so many good men lost...'
'DNT - Blah! Halros No!'
Talk to Calenglad
'You are a long way from home, Dúnadan.'
'Who are these others, and why have you come?'
'I am afraid you have wasted a journey, for I cannot be ended!'
Stand with Aragorn as he confronts Gothmog
'My will is tethered to the pitiful Ranger Golodir, and to this world.'
'There is no time to mourn, [placeholder]! We have to find Aragorn, for I fear he has gotten too far ahead and may become surrounded by his foes if we do not aid him!'
Stand with Aragorn as he confronts Gothmog
'While he lives, I cannot be slain!'
'There is too much sorrow on this field, [placeholder]. Gothmog flees, and my anger will follow him, but this is not the day he will pay for the hurts he has caused us.'
'What is this?'
'Explain yourself before you die!'
'No... he suffered such grief... how can it be?'
'How did he muster the strength to come forth?'
Your limbs are held by a powerful force, and you are unable to move!
Crúmgam must pay for his crimes against the Free Peoples of Middle-earth.
Stand against the forces of evil
Defeat Crúmgam
'[placeholder]!'
Crúmgam has been defeated, but not without sacrifice.
'There has been so much death today. When will it be over?'
'My own King fell on this field, and now I have another.'
'Ah, you show great strength of will! But it will not matter!'
'Stop... laughing...!'
'Hssssss!'
Instance: On a Field of Red
DNT - Blah!
You have become held by a powerful and evil force, unable to move!
DNT - Blah!
DNT - Blah!
You have found Aragorn and the Grey Company on the battlefield as they prepare to confront Gothmog.
'Golodir is slain! He came south to the aid of Aragorn, our chief!'
'He felled the Olog Thrúgrath, and died.'
'These are my friends and my kin.'
'We have come by dangerous roads to put an end to you and your evil.'
'Servant of Sauron! Hearken to me!'
'There is no future for you, or for your master!'
'You know my name, and the name of my mighty ancestor.'
'So too do I know yours.'
'But hearken to me, Gothmog, and Mordirith, and Eärnur!'
'I have come out of the years of darkness to defy your master and all for which he stands!'
'Sauron will fall, and Mordor will perish, and you will know the darkness of true oblivion.'
Crúmgam has been defeated!
'So much death... The field is tinged red with the blood of my kinsmen!'
'So many friends dead... and for what?'
'Glory and honour? What good do they do the dead?'
'Théoden is king no more... how long can Éomer hope to last?'
'Our foes return! When will there be an end to them?'
Follow Calenglad
You break free of Crúmgam's evil!
Stand with Aragorn as he confronts Gothmog
Talk to Aragorn
Crúmgam has been defeated!
Talk to Horn and fight alongside him
Talk to Horn and fight alongside him
